reviews.review: Ишра в которой максиииимально большой сюжет то что я удалил игру на одной миссии .-. Я ее прошел только 1 раз и то нн доконца как обычно в любой серии халф лайф ты едешь на какомто поезде... выходишь в какуюто жопу и потом резко думаешь "а нахуя я сюда приеха, лучше бы дома а4 смотрел" сюжет кнш норм но графика... сайдет но размытая ппц, но тут кнш получше будет чем гта5 я прям говорю   да и ваще по факту ты тут перестреливаешься с бревнами ходящими которые прилетели с космоса что бы нахер разъебать планету. Слишком много говна написал ну лан

Amazing first person shooter from 1998 and it still looks and feels great.
But I have one complaint and that is the two glitches I encountered.
1. I will occasionally get stuck in a wall and have to quick load an old save.
2. On Surface Tension I could not see the rockets from the tanks so I would die over and over again from something I cant even see.
So I would recommend this game to everyone if you can handle quick loading a save after encountering a game breaking glitch.
me shoot soldier and alien guys and win the day's

This is my first real playthrough of this game. I can see why it has 50 awards! It has it all. A good narrative that doesn't intrude on the action, a variety of enemies, and story continuation! Other games don't have this. In the chapter 'Forget about Freeman' (Spoilers BTW) the army soldiers are starting to lose the battle, with Freeman and Xen dwindling their forces. At the end, they all say to back off, and that's the final level with Soliders in! Modern games don't have that. Would recommend!

This is the most oldschool and stabke version of half life that's available. Except the physical version off course.

The game is great and a classic for it's time. If you find this game easy you usually don't take that long to finish it. It is also a speedrun friendly game for people that look into the speedrun community. I myself do not.

This is also the first game in history known for it's great execution of scripted events. Like scientists fighting with headcraps and map destruction during your playtrough. It also all feels like 1 big map.

The story however, it's fun but the main character doesn't speak. It is however a crucial part in the HL serie if you want to understand the story and lore of the game. In which case I also suggest the portal games.

well paced action and a good story which moves the game-play along, it's well worth a buy. my only gripe is that running on modern hardware can cause some frustrating bugs(however these can usually be gotten past), but I usually knew where I was going hand had fun, even on hard.

The oldschool, the original, the game where half the levels are frustrating as hell and the other half are masterpieces of game design. Anyone who wants to understand the history of the evolution of videogames as an artistic storytelling medium owe it to themselves to play this game at least once. Yes, it's a boomer shooter, but if you know that word then you don't need a review. 
I play through this series every couple of years, it's always a trip.
Very good game, but it doesn't finish the plot, ill have to play the second to know.

Чудесная игрушка для своего времени.
Стрельба конечно не такая приятная как в современных шутерах, игрок довольно-таки шустрый (сам перс) ну и разнообразие оружия конечно есть (хотя большинство оружия - гамно).

Хедкрабы, тектакли, снарки, ихтизавры, буллусккиды и конечно вортигонты. Вот откуда все это :)

Проходил в детстве и сейчас. Конечно графика для нашего времени ужасает, но сюжет очень даже ничего.

Русификация ставится без проблем и мод для HD мониторов (иначе играть вообще невозможно).
Озвучек этой игры много, выбирайте что по душе (можно погуглить разницу в переводах, выбирайте какая больше зайдет).

Ностальжи :)

It's very fun and charming. I have 18 hours so far and I don't think I'm close to finishing it. I'm enjoying every ounce of it. The voices, dialogue, gameplay, guns, it's all so fun. I also love how retro it is and how it's meant for old computers. It gives it a lot of charm. The tutorial alone was super charming.

Half-life is a thrill ride from start to finish. Every new encounter needs a new strategy. It's fast paced shooting makes it more intense than normal. You also need to think about your ammo, if you use A assault rifle on a hedcrab, you will probably spray your bullets everywhere and waste ammo. Killing the final bass feels good, But the thing I hate about half-life is the final chapter. The chapter xen feels rushed and unfinished same as interloper. If you want a better experience and better graphics, I should suggest Black Mesa. But overall half-life is well the best thing to experience well, half-life. Just please don't waste your money on half-life source, it is a complete train wreck. the old cover for this game includes text that perfectly describes the mechanics of the combat in this game. RUN. THINK. SHOOT. LIVE

What else can I say that hasn't already been said, for as old as this game is, it is still a legend in the first person shooter genre, and the game industry as a whole. It changed the way narrative was written in games. The combat is fun and challenging. If you haven't yet, play this and play the remastered Black Mesa, made by Crowbar Collective.

Really fun if you want something to pay attention to but not need to use every brain cell for. I love the quick movement of it all, too. Rarely every do you get shooters that don't focus on being realistic with movements. Prefer this over Half-Life 2. Multiplayer is a gem.
